scripts.dev: pnpm run build && pnpm run watch
scripts.clean: if exist dist rmdir /S /Q dist & if exist dist.zip del /Q dist.zip
scripts.copy:dist: mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I /Y src dist\src && copy /Y manifest.json dist\manifest.json
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run copy:dist && pnpm run zip:dist
